title: Missing XP Boost
body: I had purchased a xp boost based off of wins prior to hitting lv 30 and remember not fully using it up. The pre-season patch notes reminded me i had one but now that i look on my profile, its no longer there. Any reason for that? I specifically remember thinking of how it was useless in the past.

replies.body: I just checked for ya and that XP Boost is still on your account! Looks like it still has 17 wins remaining, should be a good boost once uncapped leveling hits live servers!

Yes you will get them back.

I talked with a member of support the other day about the exact same thing and was told my 7 Games XP boost was still on my account and would reactivate once the prepatch hit :)
